## DurableOperation.getStepDetails() method

Gets the details for a step operation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getStepDetails(): StepDetails<TResult> | undefined;
```

**Returns:**

[StepDetails](./durable-execution-sdk-js-testing.stepdetails.md)<!-- -->&lt;TResult&gt; \| undefined

The step operation details, or undefined if no operation data is available

Will throw an error if the operation type is not STEP
